question: Which Arbian country has opened its first movie theater in 35 yrs, with "Black Panther"?
explanation: Saudi Arabia has opened its first movie theater in 35 yrs, with "Black Panther" the first movie shown publicly in the kingdom in decades. Movie was shown at a new cinema theater built by AMC Entertainment in King Abdullah Financial District in Riyadh. The kingdom banned cinemas in early 1980s under pressure from Islamists as Saudi society turned towards a particularly severe form of religion
